value: Nolan Ryan fans be sure to catch the statue of him. The Mcdonalds on highway 35 at the south end of Alvin is replete with Nolan Ryan garb.

content=A small taqueria chain with affordable Mexican food with a nice environment!

Brazoria county is recently a "wet" county.  Previously, it was "damp" which meant you could only buy beer with low alcohol content.  The availability is still somewhat lacking, so consider going to Galveston County for a better selection.
